Haste
Whenever Skodir, Reborn attacks, choose target creature you control. You may cast a copy of its Adventure. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
rules_text2: Serpent’s Bane deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life. [i](Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)[/i]
